lead_paragraph: The party, which held its convention on Saturday in Houston, has a new sense of vitality as its candidate, Jill Stein, draws about 5 percent in polls.

headline.print_headline: Greens See Opportunity  Amid Voter Discontent
headline.main: Green Party Sees Opportunity Amid Wide Voter Discontent

snippet: The party, which held its convention on Saturday in Houston, has a new sense of vitality as its candidate, Jill Stein, draws about 5 percent in polls....
abstract: Green Party and their presidential candidate Jill Stein see opportunity to push forward progressive agenda during campaign marked by voter discontent with establishment parties; party also looks to attract Bernie Sanders supporters in hopes of securing enough support to guarantee ballot access in future campaigns.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Green Party of the United States
